response.content:
{"tool_name":"query_postgres","arguments":{"sql":"SELECT n.nspname AS schema_name,
       c.relname AS table_name,
       c.relkind AS relation_type,
       pg_total_relation_size(c.oid) AS total_bytes,
       pg_relation_size(c.oid) AS table_bytes,
       pg_total_relation_size(c.oid) - pg_relation_size(c.oid) AS aux_bytes,
       pg_size_pretty(pg_total_relation_size(c.oid)) AS total_size,
       pg_size_pretty(pg_relation_size(c.oid)) AS table_size,
       pg_size_pretty(pg_total_relation_size(c.oid) - pg_relation_size(c.oid)) AS aux_size,
       c.reltuples::bigint AS est_rows,
       obj_description(c.oid, 'pg_class') AS table_comment,
       (SELECT jsonb_agg(jsonb_build_object(
                   'column_name', a.attname,
                   'data_type', pg_catalog.format_type(a.atttypid, a.atttypmod),
                   'is_nullable', NOT a.attnotnull,
                   'default', pg_get_expr(ad.adbin, ad.adrelid),
                   'comment', col_description(a.attrelid, a.attnum)
               ) ORDER BY a.attnum)
          FROM pg_attribute a
          LEFT JOIN pg_attrdef ad
                 ON ad.adrelid = a.attrelid
                AND ad.adnum = a.attnum
         WHERE a.attrelid = c.oid
           AND a.attnum > 0
           AND NOT a.attisdropped) AS columns,
       (SELECT jsonb_agg(jsonb_build_object(
                   'index_name', ic.relname,
                   'is_primary', i.indisprimary,
                   'is_unique', i.indisunique,
                   'is_valid', i.indisvalid,
                   'definition', pg_get_indexdef(i.indexrelid)
               ) ORDER BY ic.relname)
          FROM pg_index i
          JOIN pg_class ic ON ic.oid = i.indexrelid
         WHERE i.indrelid = c.oid) AS indexes,
       (SELECT jsonb_agg(jsonb_build_object(
                   'constraint_name', con.conname,
                   'constraint_type', con.contype,
                   'definition', pg_get_constraintdef(con.oid)
               ) ORDER BY con.conname)
          FROM pg_constraint con
         WHERE con.conrelid = c.oid) AS constraints,
       (SELECT jsonb_agg(jsonb_build_object(
                   'referenced_by_table', rn.nspname || '.' || rc.relname,
                   'fk_name', con.conname,
                   'definition', pg_get_constraintdef(con.oid)
               ) ORDER BY rn.nspname, rc.relname, con.conname)
          FROM pg_constraint con
          JOIN pg_class rc ON rc.oid = con.conrelid
          JOIN pg_namespace rn ON rn.oid = rc.relnamespace
         WHERE con.contype = 'f'
           AND con.confrelid = c.oid) AS referenced_by
  FROM pg_class c
  JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
 WHERE n.nspname = 'public'
   AND c.relkind IN ('r','p','v','m','f')
 ORDER BY n.nspname, c.relname;"} }
